Risk Factors linked to IPV/DV 
• Poor social support (including being a migrant, refugee or asylum seeker)
• Rape/incest or exposure to family violence as a child
• Current alcohol or substance misuse
• Poverty, food or housing insecurity (when a woman depends on a partner for security)
• Living with a chronic disease, including HIV
